item.title: Kubernetes Installation On-Prem
item.description: This has been tested on a virtual environment, will be tested later on the definitive environment. Pre-requisites: Minimum specs: 2 CPUs 2 GB RAM 50 GB Storage Linux Distro: Ubuntu 20.04 (latest 22.04 present some issues and bugs) Docker Installation: First, you need to update the apt package index and install a few packages. These packages will allow apt to use a repository over HTTPS: sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common Then, you need to add the GPG key of the official Docker repository to your system:
